name: Drone Trials
description:
Drone Trails is a 2D side scroller game where the player has to cross obstacles from the starting point to reach the final destination. The game is based on different levels and environments; outer space, dense bamboo forest and an enchanted cave.

The main theme is neon, and keeping the theme in mind, the game objects and the level are added with heavy post processing to get a sci-fi type feel.

The game was developed in Unity Engine, the 3D models were created in Blender3D,. To add post processing in our scenes, we used URP (Universal Render Pipeline).
